    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>583</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Les Fruits</string>
            <string language="es">Les Fruits</string>
            <string language="ga">Les Fruits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Les Früchte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fruits de Les</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frutas De Les</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frutte Di Les</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φρούτα Les</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A simple quiz to test how well you know your fruits.</string>
            <string language="es">Un simple cuestionario para comprobar lo bien que conoces las frutas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gceist simplí ar chomh maith is atá torthaí ar eolas agat.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">French</string>
            <string language="es">Francés</string>
            <string language="ga">Fraincis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein einfacher Quiz, zum zu prüfen, wie gut Sie 
Ihre Früchte kennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu simple pour tester à quel point vous 
connaissez vos fruits.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um quiz simples para testar como bom você sabe 
suas frutas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un quiz semplice per esaminare come conoscete le 
vostre frutte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας απλός διαγωνισμός γνώσεων που εξετάζει πόσο 
καλά ξέρετε τα φρούτα σας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Französisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Français</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Francês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Francese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
